name: THOb
description:
Ok machine, deliver boxes in a very inconvenient way, please.

Earn coins and stuff for your hard and tedious work cause why not :)

Get skins and unlock new cages... I MEAN uh... stages by using coins.

Collect them all if you want (takes about 15 minutes for a pro gamer)

My high score is 18 in 2 minutes.

Oh, you want a tutorial? Well, there is a tutorial in da game.

Burn your eyes wit dat lovly gam grafiks.

There is totally no dark lore in this game...
